Title CASE ARGUMENT FOR LIVING TRADITION OVER HADITHS

Hadiths, or traditions, are a set of stories, legends, and teachings attributed to a particular person or group of people in Islam. While they are an important part of Islamic history and practice, they are not always reliable sources of information. In fact, there are several reasons why we should reject Hadiths and only appeal to living tradition, where information was passed in by generation.

Firstly, Hadiths can be subject to errors and inaccuracies. They were transmitted orally from one person to another over many generations, and it is easy for mistakes to be made during this process. Furthermore, there is no definitive way to determine which Hadiths are the most accurate or reliable. Different scholars and scholars have different views on the authenticity of Hadiths, and there is no consensus on the matter.

Secondly, living tradition is a more reliable source of information than Hadiths. In living tradition, information is passed down through generations by oral, visual, and tactile means. This allows for a more direct and immediate connection to the original source of the information, and it also allows for a more dynamic and evolving understanding of the information. In contrast, Hadiths are static and unchanging, and they do not allow for the same kind of growth and development as living tradition.

Thirdly, living tradition is more democratic and inclusive than Hadiths. In living tradition, anyone who has access to the information can contribute to its transmission and preservation. This allows for a more diverse and inclusive understanding of the information, and it also allows for the development of new interpretations and applications of the information. In contrast, Hadiths are often associated with a particular scholar or group of scholars, and they are often used to establish authority and hierarchy.

In conclusion, while Hadiths are an important part of Islamic history and practice, they are not always reliable sources of information. Living tradition, where information is passed down through generations by oral, visual, and tactile means, is a more reliable and democratic source of information. Therefore, we should reject Hadiths and only appeal to living tradition.  |

Title: THE 127 YEAR OLD MAN AND THE QUANTUM IMMORTALITY THEORY

In THE TOWN OF NEW HORIZONS, THERE LIVED A MAN NAMED CHARLIE WHO WAS 127 YEARS OLD. CHARLIE HAD JUST RECEIVED THE WORLD RECORD FOR OLDEST HUMAN TO EVER LIVE. THE NEWS SPREAD LIKE WIND THROUGH THE TOWN, AND EVERYONE WAS IN AWE OF THIS MIRACULOUS FEAT.

LATER THAT NIGHT, IN HIS BEDROOM, CHARLIE SAT UP STRAIGHT AND LOOKED AROUND HIM. THE MOON CAST A SILVER GLINT ON HIS FACE. HE RECALLS A THEORY HE READ ON THE INTERNET IN HIS YOUTH, CALLED "QUANTUM IMMORTALITY." HE HAD ALWAYS BEEN FASCINATED BY THIS CONCEPT, THE IDEA THAT QUANTUM PHYSICS COULD MAKE LIFE AFTER LIFE.

CHARLIE'S MIND RAN WILD. HE THOUGHT ABOUT THE ONES HE HAD LOST, THE FRIENDS, FAMILY, AND LOVES HE HAD NEVER BEEN ABLE TO SAY GOODBYE TO. HE FELT LIKE HE WAS BEING PUNTED INTO A LIFE HE WOULD NEVER HAVE LIVED.

HE STARTED TO THINK ABOUT THE IMPACT OF HIS AGE. HE WAS THE OLDEST PERSON ON EARTH, BUT HE STILL FELT YOUNG AND FULL OF LIFE. HE WONDERED, WHAT WAS THE POINT OF LIVING IF HE COULD NOT CONTINUE TO LIVE?

CHARLIE'S MIND GREW MORE AND MORE CONFUSED. HE COULD NOT REMEMBER ANYTHING. HE FELT LIKE HE WAS LOST IN A DREAM. HE STARTED TO PANIC, HIS HEART RACING AND HIS SWEAT DROPPING.

HE REALIZED THAT HE WAS HAVING A MENTAL BREAKDOWN. HE KNEW HE NEEDED HELP. HE CALLED FOR AN EMERGENCY, AND THE POLICE ARRIVED TO HELP HIM.

THE POLICE AND THE MEDICAL TEAM TOOK CHARLIE TO A HOSPITAL. THEY DISCOVERED THAT HE HAD SUFFERED A SEVERE PSYCHOSIS DUE TO THE STRESS OF LIVING TO THE MAX AGE. THEY GAVE HIM PASTA AND WATER, AND THEY TOLD HIM THAT HE WOULD NEED TO GO BACK TO HIS NORMAL LIFE.

CHARLIE WAS STILL SHAKY AND SCARED, BUT HE KNEW HE WOULD GET BETTER. HE WAS DETERMINED TO LIVE HIS LIFE TO THE FULLSTRENGTH, DESPITE HIS AGE.

THE NEXT DAY, CHARLIE WOKE UP FEELING BETTER. HE REALIZED THAT HE COULD STILL LIVE A LIFE FULL OF PURPOSE AND MEANING. HE WAS DETERMINED TO MAKE THE MOST OF HIS TIME ON EARTH, DESPITE HIS AGE.

CHARLIE CONTINUED TO LIVE HIS LIFE TO THE FULLSTRENGTH, PROVOKING A DEEP REFLECTION ON THE MEANING OF LIFE AND THE IMPACT OF AGE ON OUR LIVES. HE REMEMBERED THE THEORY OF QUANTUM IMMORTALITY, BUT HE KNEW THAT HE DID NOT NEED TO BE IMMORTAL TO LIVE A LIFE THAT WAS MEANINGFUL AND FULFILLING.
